entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High 7 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 in onshore winds. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
